original: BURSEL.JL, Claes Birger Theodor, Sparbanksdirektör, Göteborg, f Gbg 7/1 83 av handl K A V B o Hildegard Lundberg, gm Ewa Låftman. Gbgs hdlsinst 00. Tjm Gbgs Sparbk 00, kamr 17, vkst dir sed. 31, vkst dir Ränte- o Kapitalförsäkr.anst i Gbg sed. 31. Styr.led Sv Sparbksfrn, Sv Sparbk :s Garantikassa, Sparbk :s BkAB. RVO, Sv Sparbks-frns st GM.
translated: BURSEL.JL, Claes Birger Theodor, Bank Director, Gothenburg, born in Gothenburg on January 7, 1883, to merchant K A V B and Hildegard Lundberg, married to Ewa Låftman. Joined the Gothenburg Merchant Institute in 1900. Employed at Gothenburg Savings Bank in 1900, became clerk in 1917, promoted to deputy director in 1931, and finally appointed director of the Interest and Capital Insurance Division in Gothenburg in 1931. Served on the boards of the Swedish Savings Banks Association, Swedish Savings Bank's Guarantee Fund, and Savings Bank's Bank AB. Awarded the Royal Order of Vasa, and served as the honorary chairman of the Swedish Savings Banks Association.

structured.name: Claes Birger Theodor Bursel
structured.jobTitle: Honorary Chairman of the Swedish Savings Banks Association
